attributes.action: Suspend all dealings regarding treaties or constitutions between the UK and other EU states until the UK population has been given the promised referendum on the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU elite have proved themselves to be unworthy of the trust of the UK electorate after their pathetic attempts to sweep the Irish referendum result under the carpet.Consequently the UK government should suspend dealings with other state governments and agencies regarding EU constitutions ( AKA treaties ) until our population has been given the previously promised opportunity to decide for themselves. Anything less would put the UK government in a very bad light and it could not be taken seriously on matters of moral judgement having shown it lacks any whatsoever.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
